title: Sign (Burgh de Rott Ramble)

properties.name: description
properties.value: This sign is located right next to the bridge between Morytania and Misthalin, which leads from the trapdoor of Paterdomus into Canifis. When read, it says, "A total of X soldiers of fortune have been escorted to Burgh de Rott to fight against the Vampyric hordes." X is world-specific, and is aggregated from the treks done by all players on that world since the last server reboot.

Object ID23276

This sign is located right next to the bridge between Morytania and Misthalin, which leads from the trapdoor of Paterdomus into Canifis. When read, it says, "A total of X soldiers of fortune have been escorted to Burgh de Rott to fight against the Vampyric hordes." X is world-specific, and is aggregated from the treks done by all players on that world since the last server reboot.

At the other side of the Burgh de Rott Ramble trail, another sign can be read to indicate the number of souls rescued from the city.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • This area is somewhat well-known for having a rare impling spawn nearby, making it a hotspot for Nature Implings and higher level implings, making it a potentially lucrative spot for impling hunters.

This '''sign''' is located right next to the bridge between [[Morytania]] and [[Misthalin]], which leads from the trapdoor of [[Paterdomus]] into [[Canifis]]. When read, it says, "A total of X soldiers of fortune have been escorted to Burgh de Rott to fight against the Vampyric hordes." X is world-specific, and is aggregated from the treks done by all players on that world since the last server reboot.

At the other side of the [[Burgh de Rott Ramble]] trail, another [[Sign (Temple Trekking)|sign]] can be read to indicate the number of souls rescued from the city.

==Trivia==
* This area is somewhat well-known for having a rare impling spawn nearby, making it a hotspot for [[Nature Impling]]s and higher level implings, making it a potentially lucrative spot for [[impling]] hunters.
